STATE v. HANKINS No. COA04-1079. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed November 15, 2005. Certification Date December 5, 2005 Appeal from the Brunswick (02CRS57572, 02CRS57573, 02CRS57574, 02CRS57575, 02CRS57580, 02CRS57576, 02CRS57586, 02CRS57587, 02CRS57594, 02CRS57595, 03CRS630, 03CRS4606, 03CRS3616, 03CRS3617).

Case Reported Without Published Opinion. New trial.
